metadata.title: CVE-2023-52615 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:hwrng: core - Fix page fault dead lock on mmap-ed hwrngThere is a dead-lock in the hwrng device read path.  This triggerswhen the user reads from /dev/hwrng into memory also mmap-ed from/dev/hwrng.  The resulting page fault triggers a recursive readwhich then dead-locks.Fix this by using a stack buffer when calling copy_to_user.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
